captions.text:
- CAN WE TALK ABOUT
THE VIDEO MUSIC AWARDS?

AND THERE WAS
A SLIGHT MALFUNCTION?

- YEAH.
- AND I DIDN'T KNOW WHAT IT WAS.

I KNOW THERE'S A LOT OF
SPECULATION OF WHAT IT WAS.

BUT THERE WAS
A QUICK CHANGEOVER, RIGHT?

- YEAH, YEAH.
- WHAT HAPPENED?

- WELL, I HAD, I THINK--
I DON'T KNOW,

ABOUT 40 OR 50 SECONDS TO CHANGE
FROM THE "ANACONDA" OUTFIT
INTO THE "BANG BANG" OUTFIT.

AND I WANTED TO--
I DON'T KNOW WHY.

I SHOULD'VE--
ORIGINALLY,
I WAS GONNA JUST HAVE A SKIRT

THAT JUST WRAPPED
AROUND THE GREEN,

BUT THEN WHEN I REALIZED
THAT JESSIE AND ARIANA

WERE WEARING BLACK AND WHITE,
I DIDN'T WANT TO RUIN THE SHOT
WITH ME WEARING A GREEN BRA

AND THEM WEARING
BLACK AND WHITE.

SO I WAS LIKE, "I HAVE TO PUT ON
A BLACK DRESS REALLY QUICKLY."

AND SURE ENOUGH,
WE DIDN'T HAVE, LIKE,
A REAL QUICK CHANGE RIGHT THERE,

SO IT WAS LITERALLY
MY WHOLE TEAM

JUST STANDING THERE
HOLDING CURTAINS AROUND ME.

AND IT WAS PITCH BLACK.
I COULDN'T SEE ANYTHING.

AND RIGHT BEFORE IT WAS TIME
FOR ME TO WALK OUT,
THEY WENT TO ZIP IT UP AND...

[whispering]
NOTHING.

AND RIGHT THERE,
I THOUGHT I DIED.
LIKE, I--LIKE, IT WAS--
SO YOU HAD TO WALK OUT

HOLDING THE WHOLE THING
TOGETHER.
- [laughs]

I DIDN'T HAVE
ANY UNDERWEAR ON.
LIKE, NO UNDERWEAR, NO BRA.
BECAUSE I HAD JUST TAKEN OFF
THE "ANACONDA" OUTFIT.
SO I WAS BUTT-ASS NAKED.
[laughter]

[laughs]
LIKE, IT WAS A--
I DON'T KNOW.

- NO, BUT KNOWING THAT,
AND SEEING
HOW CALM AND COLLECTED YOU WERE

WALKING,
HOLDING YOUR OUTFIT TOGETHER

WITH NOTHING ON UNDERNEATH IT
AND SINGING

IN FRONT OF MILLIONS
OF PEOPLE?

- YEAH.
- PRETTY CALM, YOU KNOW.

I THINK YOU HANDLED IT
REALLY, REALLY WELL.
- THANK YOU.

- I GOT YOU SOMETHING
IN CASE IT HAPPENS AGAIN.
[cheers and applause]
[laughter]
IT'S A SAFETY PIN.

- [laughs]
- ALL RIGHT?
SO YOU CAN JUST--

- TO SAFETY PIN
MY BIG DRESS?

- YEAH, YOU PUT IT TOGETHER,
AND YOU JUST SAFETY PIN IT.

- ELLEN,
WHY WOULD YOU GET ME THIS?
[laughter]

- 'CAUSE I HAD IT,
AND SO I GAVE IT TO YOU.
THAT'S WHY.
- THANK YOU, EL.
- YOU'RE WELCOME.
